Traits.Name: Rain of Falling Ice
Traits.Content: The presence of the Hole Punch Cloud generates an area of freezing rain in a 30-foot radius. Any creature that starts its turn in this area must succeed on a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw or take 17 (5d6) cold damage and have disadvantage on attack rolls until the start of its next turn.

Traits.Name: Warped Sound
Traits.Content: Creatures within 60 feet of the Hole Punch Cloud have disadvantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing, as the sound becomes distorted and difficult to process.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Hole Punch Cloud makes two Melee Attacks with its Ice Shard Slam.

Actions.Name: Ice Shard Slam
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (6d6 + 9) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn due to the shock of freezing shards.

Actions.Name: Chilling Breath
Actions.Content: Ranged Attack: +14 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 35 (4d12 + 9) cold damage. The target's movement speed is halved until the end of its next turn as it struggles against the bone-chilling air.

Actions.Name: Frozen Burst (Recharge 5-6)
Actions.Content: The Hole Punch Cloud unleashes a wave of icy energy. Each creature within 10 feet of a point it can see within 500 feet must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 (12d8) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. This icy force also imposes disadvantage on the next attack roll the affected creatures make before the end of their next turn.
